These measurements have been done using 2 services on the pipeline: 
- ambra/energy (0.0.1) -> (modified to send 1 energy message per second)
- ambra/analyser (0.0.2)

The rover has been plugged in using a charger, battery level is at 19.81V.

Check Idle.py for setup commands in order to test the experiment.

Each run has 15.8s, same time-length as It would take the rover to drive one lap on the track.

Experiment done: 29 April approx. 11:30am
